- Fix Sunday bug in weekly signup card calculation
- Fix SQL GROUP BY in getAdminCourseProgress
- Update replit.md with full 3-application documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
